MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA26 postcode area of Ay. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and became aware of this at 9:35AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of  a grounded overhead cable near to Ligburn Cottage and our team are now working to get your power back on rs quickly and as safely as possible by 4PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:15AM on 09 January 2021
